baseResourceName.Description: The base name to use for the resources that will be provisioned.

senderUPNList.Description: Semicolon-delimited list of the user principal names (UPNs) allowed to send messages.

tenantId.Description: The ID of the tenant to which the app will be deployed.

customDomainOption.Description: How the app will be hosted on a domain that is not *.azurewebsites.net. Azure Front Door is an easy option that the template can set up automatically, but it comes with ongoing monthly costs.

proactivelyInstallUserApp.Description: If proactive app installation should be enabled.

supportedCultures.Description: Comma-delimited list of the supported cultures.

appDescription.Value: Broadcast messages to multiple teams and people in one go.

appIconUrl.Description: The link to the icon for the app. It must resolve to a PNG file.

hostingPlanSku.Description: The pricing tier for the hosting plan.

gitRepoUrl.Description: The URL to the GitHub repository to deploy.

gitBranch.Description: The branch of the GitHub repository to deploy.
